p: Moreover, many cytotoxic activity tests of Thymus algeriensis EOs have been done on several tumor cells such as breast cancer MCF-7, small cell lung cancer NCI-H460, Colon cancer (HCT15), Cervical cancer (HeLa), Human Prostate Cancer (PC3), and Human leukemia (K562); those tests have given ineffective results compared to the reference compounds used (Doxorubicin and Elipticine) [ 17, 18].
